name: launchpad_finishline
description: Code for the Finishline Launchpad Project

scripts.prisma:reset: cd src/backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.prisma:seed: cd src/backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.prisma:migrate:dev: cd src/backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.database:setup: yarn database:setup:script && docker run --name launchpad -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=docker -p 8000:5432 -d postgres && sleep 5 && docker exec launchpad psql -U postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE nerpm;" && yarn prisma:reset
scripts.start: yarn workspace shared build && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "yarn backend:dev" "yarn frontend:dev"
scripts.test:setup: node scripts/test-setup.js && docker run --name launchpad_test -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=docker -p 8001:5432 -d postgres && sleep 5 && docker exec launchpad_test psql -U postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE nerpm;" && yarn prisma:migrate
scripts.test:teardown: docker stop launchpad_test && docker rm launchpad_test && node scripts/test-teardown.js
scripts.test:backend: yarn workspace shared build && yarn workspace backend test

author: Northeastern Electric Racing
